title: give
description: Gives an item to a player.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: itemName
fields.description: An `enum` of the type of item to give.

fields.title: amount
fields.description: Amount to give to player. Default: `1`.

fields.title: data
fields.description: Optional. Fireworks related `data` required to give a firework type item.

fields.title: components
fields.description: Optional. Specify if the item has components to call required component events.

overloads.title: Give item to target
overloads.description: Give a set of players selected via a target selector an item.
